_PAGE_PLUGIN_SPINNER_INTRODUCTION_:
Introduction

ASpinnerPlugin is used to set default values for the props of the ASpinner component. This allows centralized customization of the spinner's appearance and behavior, including its class, size, HTML content, and other properties.
_PAGE_PLUGIN_SPINNER_CONNECTION_:
Connection

To connect the plugin, add it to your project and configure default props:
_PAGE_PLUGIN_SPINNER_CONNECTION_NOTES_:
Notes

You can override the following properties:

  • class: CSS class for the spinner (default: a_spinner).
  • safeHtml: HTML content inside the spinner.
  • size: Spinner size (default: undefined).
  • tag: HTML tag used for wrapping (default: span).
  • ariaLabel: Text for the aria-label attribute (default: "_A_SPINNER_LOADING_").
  • extra: Object with parameters for translations.
_PAGE_PLUGIN_SPINNER_EXAMPLES_:
Usage Examples
